original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business needs and technical solutions, requiring a unique blend of business acumen, analytical skills, and technical proficiency. As a key player in our organization, you will be responsible for understanding complex business processes, translating them into effective system configurations, and driving continuous improvement through data-driven insights. Your ability to collaborate cross-functionally and communicate technical information to non-technical stakeholders will be essential to the success of this position.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements and document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, leveraging tools for querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data
- Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and participate in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps
- Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to think critically and identify innovative solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, with the ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in understanding and documenting business requirements using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Hands-on experience in configuring and maintaining complex enterprise systems, with a deep understanding of data mapping, integration, and testing processes

Preferred Skills:
- Familiarity with Java and SQL, which are commonly used in the development and maintenance of enterprise systems
- Experience in applying machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) techniques to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency

Required Experience:
- Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a similar role, where you have demonstrated the ability to bridge the gap between business and technology
- Proven track record of successfully translating business requirements into effective system configurations and driving continuous improvement

Preferred Experience:
- Experience with Agile methodologies, which are widely adopted in the industry to promote collaboration, flexibility, and rapid delivery
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration systems and processes, which would be highly relevant to the focus of this role

Tools & Technologies:
- Proficient in the use of [mention specific system] and its configuration tools
- Experience with data analysis and visualization tools (e.g., SQL, Excel, Power BI)
- Familiarity with Agile project management tools (e.g., Jira, Trello)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- This role will be primarily office-based, with occasional opportunities for remote work or collaboration with distributed teams
- Collaboration and communication with cross-functional teams, including business stakeholders, developers, and IT support, will be a key aspect of this position
- The successful candidate will be expected to work in an Agile environment, embracing iterative development and continuous improvement practices

Role Overview:
As a technical configuration specialist, this role is responsible for translating complex business requirements into efficient and effective system configurations. You will be a critical link between our organization's business objectives and the underlying technology that supports them. Your ability to understand and document business processes, as well as your technical expertise in configuring and maintaining enterprise systems, will be essential to ensuring the seamless integration of business and technology. This position offers the opportunity to drive continuous improvement and innovation, leveraging data-driven insights to optimize system performance and enhance user experiences.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with cross-functional stakeholders, including business analysts, subject matter experts, and IT professionals, to gather detailed requirements and document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Analyze and interpret business requirements, identifying the most appropriate technical configurations and integrations within our [mention specific system] backend
- Design, implement, and test new system configurations, ensuring they align with business needs and function as expected
- Troubleshoot and resolve configuration-related issues, working closely with IT support and development teams to identify and address the root causes
- Continuously monitor system performance and identify opportunities for improvement, leveraging data analysis and visualization tools to uncover trends and inefficiencies
- Propose and implement configuration changes and best practices to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing maintenance and future enhancements
- Serve as a subject matter expert, providing guidance and training to end-users on system configurations and functionality

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to think critically and identify innovative solutions
- Strong technical proficiency in configuring and maintaining enterprise-level systems, with a deep understanding of data mapping, integration, and testing processes
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical stakeholders
- Proficiency in documenting business requirements using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Demonstrated ability to work collaboratively in cross-functional teams and contribute to the successful delivery of technical solutions

Preferred Skills:
- Familiarity with Java and SQL, which are commonly used in the development and maintenance of enterprise systems
- Experience in applying machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) techniques to optimize system performance and streamline business processes

Required Experience:
- Minimum 5 years of experience in a technical configuration or business analysis role, where you have successfully bridged the gap between business requirements and technical solutions
- Proven track record of delivering high-quality system configurations that meet or exceed business expectations

Preferred Experience:
- Experience with Agile methodologies, which are widely adopted in the industry to promote collaboration, flexibility, and rapid delivery
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration systems and processes, which would be highly relevant to the focus of this role

Tools & Technologies:
- Proficient in the use of [mention specific system] and its configuration tools
- Experience with data analysis and visualization tools (e.g., SQL, Excel, Power BI)
- Familiarity with Agile project management tools (e.g., Jira, Trello)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- This role will be primarily office-based, with occasional opportunities for remote work or collaboration with distributed teams
- Collaboration and communication with cross-functional teams, including business stakeholders, developers, and IT support, will be a key aspect of this position
- The successful candidate will be expected to work in an Agile environment, embracing iterative development and continuous improvement practices, and contributing to a culture of innovation and excellence

Role Overview:
This role is a unique opportunity to blend your technical expertise with your business acumen, serving as a strategic partner in driving the successful integration of our [mention specific system] with the evolving needs of our organization. As a technical configuration specialist, you will be responsible for translating complex business requirements into efficient and effective system configurations, ensuring our technology solutions accurately reflect and support our operational goals. Your ability to analyze data, identify trends and inefficiencies, and propose innovative solutions will be critical in optimizing system performance and enhancing user experiences. This position offers the chance to work closely with cross-functional teams, contribute to the continuous improvement of our systems, and make a tangible impact on the success of our business.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements, leveraging industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows) to document and prioritize their needs
- Analyze and interpret business requirements, designing and implementing technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend that align with organizational objectives
- Develop and maintain comprehensive configuration specifications, ensuring the integrity and consistency of our system integrations and data mappings
- Implement and thoroughly test new configurations, participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate that they meet business requirements and function as expected
- Proactively monitor system performance, leveraging data analysis and visualization tools to identify opportunities for improvement and streamlining
- Propose and implement configuration changes and best practices to enhance system efficiency, reduce operational costs, and improve user experiences
- Troubleshoot and resolve configuration-related issues, collaborating with IT support and development teams to address the root causes and implement sustainable solutions
- Maintain detailed documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing maintenance and future enhancements
- Serve as a subject matter expert, providing guidance and training to end-users on system configurations and functionality, and fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to think strategically and identify innovative, data-driven solutions
- Proven technical expertise in configuring and maintaining enterprise-level systems, with a deep understanding of data mapping, integration, and testing processes
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams and translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical stakeholders
- Proficiency in documenting business requirements using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Demonstrated ability to work in an Agile environment, embracing iterative development and continuous improvement practices

Preferred Skills:
- Familiarity with Java and SQL, which are commonly used in the development and maintenance of enterprise systems
- Experience in applying machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) techniques to optimize system performance and streamline business processes

Required Experience:
- Minimum 7 years of experience in a technical configuration or business analysis role, where you have successfully bridged the gap between business requirements and technical solutions
- Proven track record of delivering high-impact system configurations that have significantly improved operational efficiency, reduced costs, and enhanced user experiences

Preferred Experience:
- Experience with Agile methodologies, which are widely adopted in the industry to promote collaboration, flexibility, and rapid delivery
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration systems and processes, which would be highly relevant to the focus of this role

Tools & Technologies:
- Proficient in the use of [mention specific system] and its configuration tools
- Experience with data analysis and visualization tools (e.g., SQL, Excel, Power BI)
- Familiarity with Agile project management tools (e.g., Jira, Trello)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- This role will be primarily office-based, with occasional opportunities for remote work or collaboration with distributed teams
- Collaboration and communication with cross-functional teams, including business stakeholders, developers, and IT support, will be a key aspect of this position
- The successful candidate will be expected to work in an Agile environment, embracing iterative development and continuous improvement practices, and contributing to a culture of innovation and excellence
- The ability to think strategically, identify opportunities for improvement, and deliver impactful solutions will be critical to success in this role
